casebody.data:
BAUMANN v. DE LOGEROT et al. (Supreme Court, General Term, First Department. December 15, 1893.) Appeal from special term, New York county. Action by Ludwig Baumann against Richard De Logerot and another. From an order granting judgment on demurrer as frivolous, and from the judgment entered thereon, defendants appeal. Affirmed.

Argued before VAN BRUNT, P. J., and O’BRIEN and FOLLETT, JJ.

F. R. Coudert, Jr., for appellants. W. H. Shepard, for respondent. PER CURIAM.

Order and judgment affirmed, with costs.
